title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 43.17 - Dry cleaning machines-solvent and residue handling
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 43.17 - Dry cleaning machines-solvent and residue handling

State Regulations
(a) No solvents shall be stored or used other
than those identified in the accepted installation plans and
specifications. (b) Solvents shall
be stored only in appropriately labeled and tightly closed containers of
substantial and durable construction and not exceeding 55 gallons
capacity. (c) The transfer of
solvents by use of pails or similar open containers is prohibited. (d) Filter and other residues and sludges
stored pending safe disposal shall be kept in tightly covered leakproof
containers not exceeding 55 gallons capacity. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
43.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
